p: An EO obtained from Brazilian plant material [ 75] contained the following major constituents: limonene (7.0%), ( Z)-Î²-ocimene (5.1%), dihydrotagetone (54.2%), and ( E)-tagetone (6.7%). A second Brazilian EO was dominated by piperitone (86.3%) and limonene (13.7%) [ 76]. Two EOs from Kenya were analyzed [ 77, 78], and the results are summarized in Table 8.
